title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8128.67 - Town of Hempstead
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8128.67 - Town of Hempstead

State Regulations
(a) Merrick

Avenue, a county road, between Old Country Road and Stewart Avenue, a distance
of 0.8 mile, is designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7
p.m. and 7 a.m. (b) Stewart Avenue. Stewart Avenue between Merrick Avenue and Caldor Store, Garden City. (c) Quentin Roosevelt Boulevard, a county
road, between Stewart Avenue and Commercial Avenue, a distance of 0.2 mile, is
designated as an access highway for special dimension vehicles; provided, however, that this route shall only be used between the hours of 7 p.m. and 7
a.m. (d) East Gate Boulevard. East

Gate Boulevard between Old County Road and North Avenue. (e) North Avenue. North Avenue between East

Gate Boulevard and the Roadway Package Systems terminal. (g) Route 24. Route 24 between

Hempstead-Oyster Bay town line and Caldor Store, Levitttown. (h) Route 135 between Route 27 and Merrick

Road. (i) Merrick Road between

Route 135 and Hempstead/Oyster Bay town line. (j) Merrick Avenue between Stewart Avenue and

Route 24. (k) Route 24 between

Merrick Avenue and East Meadow Avenue. (l) East Meadow Avenue between Route 24 and

Pathmark Facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8128.67

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
